title: The Kings message to both Houses January 12. 1641.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Majesty: and by the assignes of John Bill,
notes: "His Majesties profession and addition to his last message to the Parliament" is dated: January 14, 1641 [i.e. 1642].
With engraving of royal seal of Charles I at head of document.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library and the Harvard University Library.
